4. Learning English through Debating
It has recently been reported that some parents in Asian countries are installing apps on their children’s mobile phones that monitor their activities to ensure that they use theses devices responsibly.
Write a letter to the Young Post stating whether you agree with these parents’ actions or not. Justify your position with three reasons.


Dear editor,
While your children are using their smartphone , they are facing a large amount of information, be it beneficial or harmful. Recently,some parents in Asian countries are installing apps on their children's mobile phones, claiming that it can prevent them from falling into online traps or scams. Other frown upon it, believing that it would hamper their personal growth. After deepen consideration, it is my belief that parents should not install an app on their children's mobile phone.

There is a series of reasons to support my stance. To commence with, installing apps on children's phones undermines the relationship between parent and child . We do not need experts to convince us that communication and education are the best recipe for good bonding between parent and child . However, parents in Hong Kong need to work all day long. Whether they can squeeze the sufficient time from daily routine to have a chit-chat with their children , is truest questionable. Hardly do they can spare time to chat with their kids, let alone to educate them. Lacking communication with their parents , children may feel isolated and conflicts crops up easily. In light of this, installing apps to monitor children's use of electronic device undeniably exacerbates this problem. Teenagers , Who already hardly feel the love of their parents, would see this action as an deep distrust. They may then be less willing to open up to their parents, or even act against their parents' will, which could do irreparable harm to their relationship.Undermining the relationship between parents and children is the last thing we want to see.

Not only is installing the apps detrimental their bond , it is equally bad for the students' ability of distinguishing right from wrong. Many parents are under the false impression that installing the app on the children's phone is tantamount to staying them away from falling prey with online traps. With The filtering The unsuitable information from their parents. The children haven't enough chances to a differentiate right form wrong. If they cannot realise their critical thinking, it is beyond doubt that it would retard their personal growth. As we can see, installing the app on the children's phone, while good intentioned,is ill-conceived.

Some people may counter my stand , claiming that installing the apps on the children's phone is the best way to prevent them from falling prey with online traps. While you use the smartphone to browse the Internet, there is abundant of unsuitable information, ranging from pornography to cruel movie. In hopes of preventing them from falling such a scam, parents should shoulder the responsibility to monitor them through the app. However, it is not the best method to defend their beloved children . Internet is full of information, be it good or bad, as a parent, how can they filter the information by themselves. What really can protect their children is communication. As a parent, they should spare 10 to 15 minutes about using the smartphone correctly even though they are facing enormous of workload . Beyond doubt, this is beneficial to their personal growth, rather than staying as“Hong kids" looked after by their helicopter parents , they would be independent grow-ups. Not only can they learn the skills of critical thinking, but also can they gain time to check with their parents.

In The face of a lot of difficulties in the world , parents cannot protect their beloved children for a whole life. What really can help them to conquer such a hurdle is education and communication instead of just installing the app on the phone to monitor their actions.

1. Use of Articles: 好多the其實係唔需要，例如寫installing apps已經足夠。一般黎講我地用the都係希望refer to一樣specific啲既嘢，但呢啲apps其實係比較general，所以嗰the係比較多餘。
2. Inversion: 用高階句式用得準確當然可以加分，但你啲inversion有一啲比較明顯既grammar mistakes，例如‘Hardly do they can spare time to chat with their kids, let alone to educate them’應該寫成‘ Hardly can they spare time to chat with their kids, let alone to educate them’。
3. Word Choice: 一啲用詞比較古怪，例如reasons唔會用a series of，information用beneficial同harmful黎形容都有啲古怪。
4. Run-on Sentences: 'With The filtering The unsuitable information from their parents'呢句我估你應該係用/打錯標點，都有必要注意下。
